A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Complete disappointment of a movie due to a laughably poor script. There were too many logic defying moments in the movie that didn't even follow the rules setup within the Star Wars universe. \n\nIf you're totally fine with a galactic powerhouse chasing (more like leisurely jogging) after a cruiser because they can't figure out a watch to catch up to it\, you'll love this movie. If you have a problem with that\, skip it because it doesn't get any better.
